pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Utils## DescriptionI found myself using the same code over and over across projects so I created a package to import my own code faster.## Install```bashpip install dgarbsutils```## Usage```pythonfrom dgarbsutils import utils, awsUtils```## Build```bashpython -m build```## Upload```bashpython3 -m twine upload --repository pypi dist/*python3 -m twine upload --repository nexus dist/*```
